name: Imperial Storm
description:
Imperial Storm is a new style card strategy game.

The year is 1403 and you are a young aspirant coming to Beijing hoping to prove yourself in the Forbidden City. The emperor newly secured the throne (after bloodshed), and is happy to promote anyone capable and loyal. The glory of the palace is shining upon you, the temptation of power feels more than ever dazzlingly real. But what they will never tell you, it that once you start the game, there's no way out. Recruit trustworthy followers to counter conspiracy and become a strong power in the court!

It contains story mode, 1v1 competetive mode and online relax mode. Players will collect followers(cards) and build up their own teams to enjoy the strategy and survive in the court.
